item.title: Basical Skills
item.description: Notes: Here is a link to my Github homepage, Jia-Baos. C++ is the programming language i use most, python and shell are often used for scripting, furthermore, cmake and mingw wil be used for compiling across platforms. Opencv is the 3rd party library i use most, besides, i’m also trying more 3rd party libraries such as: Blas, MKL, etc.
